alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun County through 330 PM CDT... At 243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Olivia, or 10 miles east of Port Lavaca, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Lavaca, Point Comfort, Alamo Beach, Olivia, Indianola, Magnolia Beach, Schicke Point and Port Alto. This includes US Highway 87 near mile marker 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
